name: Om
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday my Super BFF!! Yayyyyy!  Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Happy Birthday, Cutie! 🎉🎂🎈 You are seriously one of the best people I know, and I’m so lucky to have you as my best friend. 🤗 From all the crazy adventures 🚗💨 to the late-night talks 🌙, you make every moment unforgettable. Thank you for always being there for me—through the ups ⬆️ and the downs ⬇️. I honestly don’t know what I’d do without you. You’re strong 💪, hilarious 😂, and genuinely one-of-a-kind you are. 🙌 On your special day, I hope you know how much you mean to me and how grateful I am for your friendship. Here’s to another year of making memories 🥳, laughing too much 😆, and being there for each other. Let’s keep this wild ride going! 🚀💥 Enjoy your day, Pilu! 🍻💙Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
